messages.subject: Artificial Sweetners
messages.msgSnippet: We don t use artificial sweetners at all, read enough and seen enough to just not go there. Here are 2 web sites I found: THE BITTER TRUTH ABOUT ARTIFICIAL
messages.messageBody:
We don't use artificial sweetners at all, read enough and seen enough to
just not go there.

Here are 2 web sites I found:

THE BITTER TRUTH ABOUT
ARTIFICIAL SWEETENERS

http://www.nexusmagazine.com/Aspartame.html

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Detailed scientific and general documentation regarding the toxicity of
nutrasweet
http://www.holisticmed.com/aspartame/
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We use honey or cane sugar. My mate uses sugar, sometimes my son does.
Everyone here has their choice, but we dont use the artificial.

Peace,
Tami


----- Original Message -----
From: "Shyrley" <shyrley.williams@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 16, 2002 10:19 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Scary food AND Serious drugs?


> On 16 Oct 02, at 16:52, Betsy wrote:
>
> > **
> > One of the interesting things about MS and Fibromyalgia is that we
> > lose track half way through anything. Add that to my sheer laziness
> > that I never proof read my emails and distares can happen **
> >
> > Let me cross this back to the scary food additives part of the thread.
> > A friend of mine was web-surfing recently and talked about finding
> > info online about people with MS having their symptoms made worse by
> > consuming Nutrasweet (Aspartame).
> >
> > Has anyone here done much research on artificial sweeteners? It's a
> > topic of interest to me.
> >
> > Betsy
> >
> Aspartame gives me migraines.
>
> Shyrley
>
>
> "You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all
the same."
>
>
>
